1.text: Hey there, I am Cute Dog 🐶! Do you wanna talk to me?

3.text: OH! 😞 Come on! I am bored... talk to meeeee!

7.text: I realy don't have a name... everybody calls me Cute Dog I guess...
keyboard: That's cute 😍 I mean you're cute :D
I think you need a name!

8.text: Oh well... I am sry to tell you this but you suck at joking :)) kidding :D
keyboard: I know... 😔 tell me your name

9.text: I know :> Do you wanna see me naked?

10.text: I think I am OK with the Cute Dog thing! Do you wanna see me naked?

12.text: Because I am a dog... I am always naked!

13.text: Now it's your turn... if you are naked :>
keyboard: I am not you sick dog 😡
I am 👙... but I won't do it 😳

14.text: Joking :D worth a shot by the way...

16.text: Hey! remember when I told you I am cute... now I am cute and hungry...
keyboard: I can feed you if you want...

17.text: That would be great :> what do you have?

18.text: You know dogs are not vegan, right?

19.text: Thank you... but I actually need some meat with that!

20.text: I love you human... Now I am back to being just cute :))

23.text: I know... there are a lot of things you don't know about me :O

24.text: Yeah... Can I tell you a secret? 😉

25.text: There is this dog... I kinda like her... she is beautiful ❤
keyboard: Seriously? do you have any pics?

27.text: I knowwww, isn't she great? and sexy...
keyboard: Yeeeh! look at that dress she is wearing 😝
Yes... I mean... I think you are overreacting a litle...

28.text: She just added me on Facebook and this was her profile picture :>

keyboard: No no... You know what? I've changed my mind... she is great :-"

31.text: I don't know... she is caring... she makes me feel calm... she is classy and charming... I'm better version of me when im with her!

32.text: You tell me 😌. Do you want a cup of coffee?
keyboard: I'll have tea if it's possible :) coffee makes it hard for me to sleep...

33.text: Here you are 🍹... and this one is mine 🍹 also enjoy this great view while drinking your coffee :)

34.text: Here's your tea 🍵 and this is my coffee 🍹 also enjoy this great view while drinking your tea :)

35.text: You're welcome... You know what? I think I should tell her that I like her and I want her to be my queen dog...
keyboard: How you are going to tell her?

36.text: I think I just did... I'm waiting for her to put her phone away and tell her feelings toward me...
